sources.title: Colorado Sundown
sources.description: Rancher helps a friend claim a spread he's inherited, only to get involved in his murder.

sources.title: Colorado Sundown (1952) REX ALLEN
sources.description:
Stars: Rex Allen, Koko, Mary Ellen Kay 
 Director: William Witney

 Rancher helps a friend claim a spread he's inherited, only to get involved in his murder.

metadata.Plot: The Hurley's own a lumber mill and want to harvest all the timber in the valley. They kill the Forester and substitute their brother Dusty in his place. Dusty then says all the trees are infected and must be cut down. But Rex Allen is suspicious and writes to the Forestry Department.
metadata.Actors: Rex Allen, Koko, Mary Ellen Kay
